document.full_text: the top candidate to run the international monetary fund, french finance minister christine lagarde, said she backed a bigger say for china at the fund while making clear that the euro zone crisis would be a priority if she wins the job.
document.title: lagarde says backs more say for china at imf
lines_and_colors: the top candidate to run the international monetary fund, french finance minister christine lagarde, said she backed a bigger say for china at the fund while making clear that the euro zone crisis would be a priority if she wins the job.
